name: Colin Ellis
seeking: Colin is a professional business consultant who would seek JV partners with established client networks of SMB owners or executives who need consulting or operational strategy support. He is likely open to referral or co-delivery arrangements with complementary service professionals. A cross-referral arrangement with a marketing strategist, accountant, or business coach targeting the same market would be a practical fit.
who_you_serve: Colin has a global client base across 5 continents, 20+ countries, and 120+ cultures, serving clients in various industries including sports, FMCG, transport & infrastructure, government, aviation, energy, retail, media & marketing, professional services, engineering, and start-ups.
social_proof: Colin has a track record of success in working with teams of all sizes, in all sectors around the world to help them to build the conditions for happiness, safety and success. He has over 170 recommendations on LinkedIn.
signature_programs: Colin has authored several books including 'Detox Your Culture', 'Culture Fix', 'Culture Hacks', 'The Project Book', and 'The Hybrid Handbook'.
service_provided: Workshops, consulting, virtual programs, coaching, speaking
